lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Roger Federer defeated Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 7-6 (5), to move into the final of the Swiss Indoors tournament in his hometown, Basel. Federer will play Jarkko Nieminen, who advanced by beating Marcos Baghdatis, 7-6 (4), 6-2.
snippet: Top-seeded Roger Federer defeated Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 7-6 (5), to move into the final of the Swiss Indoors tournament in his hometown, Basel. Federer will play Jarkko Nieminen, who advanced by beating Marcos Baghdatis, 7-6 (4), 6-2.
